title: frankbitcoin
author: frankbitcoin
created_time: March 04, 2023, 11:53:38 PMLast edit: March 07, 2023, 05:51:10 AM by frankbitcoin
content: Restarting with a lower opening bid -When I purchased it several years ago, I thought it would be cool to accumulate some pieces from October 31st, 2008 - this is from The Times and includes the Certificate of Authenticity as well as the "Day To Remember" hard box.Auction Terms:Starting Bid:  .0025BTCMinimum Bid Increments:  .0001BTCShipping:  $20 US shipping or $40 International.  Will ship flat with tracking.Auction Ends:  Wednesday, March 8th, 6 PM ESTSniping:  No, any bid made during the last ten minutes of the auction will extend the auction an additional ten minutes until no further bids have been made.
